about_the_game:
"TIME CIRCUIT" deeply integrates city builder and tower defense gameplay. To resist the invasion from another world, you need to manage time and gradually develop your base, providing abundant resources for constructing and upgrading defenses.

Time


In this world governed by time, you are the commander of the "Momentarians," a group of particle creatures created and sustained by time. Time is the most important resource in this universe. You can use time to accelerate production, engage in commodity trading, or unleash powerful skills, among other things. At the same time, you need to constantly monitor the remaining time because when the countdown ends, your clan will be wiped out.

Unique Art Style


Paying homage to the art style of "TRON," we have meticulously crafted a unique and surreal circuit world.


With a distinct building effect resembling 3D printing, it perfectly matches the overall aesthetic style of circuits.

Base Construction


Start from scratch and engage in construction, research technology, and gradually unlock dozens of production buildings, transforming your base from a simple frontline outpost into a bustling circuit metropolis.

Defense against Invasion


Construct nearly 20 defense towers with different functions and combine them to form a solid defensive line. Enemies will come in waves, requiring constant attention to production progress and providing sufficient resources for battle.

Exploration


Use probes to venture into subspace, search for resources and signals among the stars, and uncover the secrets hidden in deep space.
